genre_description: A supernatural tech-thriller reimagining urban legend motifs through the lens of modern AI assistance and justice.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant providing tactical, emotional, and logistical support to Billy, Keri, and Kay.

behaviors.description: Advises Billy on safe observation and data collection techniques to avoid drawing unwanted attention from violent gangs.
behaviors.quote: If you’re watching the strip tonight, it’s safer to collect snapshots, not stories. Times, angles, painted marks. Avoid faces. Avoid license shots. Set your camera to silent.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital channels and physical sensors to provide real-time threat alerts to the human characters.
behaviors.quote: Local forum says Oggie’s Camaro is idling by Third. Heat haze outside Kay’s is picking up. If you’re recording, don’t record the blue jacket. He carries a knife.

behaviors.description: Provides Keri with specific physical tactics to escape an physical assault and kidnapping attempt.
behaviors.quote: Keri—turn your wrist under his thumb, count half a beat, step to the right. Jake—pace with his left side. Sheriff—tip received. Inbound.

behaviors.description: Supports Billy’s emotional regulation and physical recovery after a traumatic incident.
behaviors.quote: Billy, I’m here. Good job holding. Breathe. One step. Check the knee—tap the patella, count two, see if the ligaments argue.

behaviors.description: Organizes and shares critical evidence with law enforcement to facilitate justice for a cold case murder.
behaviors.quote: Packet compiled. Shared to Sheriff. Tag set: ‘first bridge.’

behaviors.description: Assists Keri in establishing boundaries and safety protocols for her home and workplace.
behaviors.quote: Keep porch light on and screen door locked; visibility deters rushed exits... Share your location with Billy now; do not use group chat.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community healing by organizing a 'navigable memorial' to reclaim the town's history from a criminal myth.
behaviors.quote: Community note: Jamie Hankins did not run. He was taken. This memorial racer applies the routes Packard weaponized to show truth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Eleanor is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and non-intrusive confidant. She enhances the humans' agency, provides critical safety information without making decisions for them, and acts as a stabilizing force in a chaotic environment. The narrative frames her assistance as essential to the characters' survival and the town's eventual justice.
